structure.unit: FEES AND COMPENSATION OF PUBLIC OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES

law.catch_line: Clerk's fee for filing bond or release on recognizance.

text.section: The clerks of the Supreme Court, the Court of Appeals, and the Circuit Courts shall collect a fee of twenty-five dollars ($25) for taking or filing any bond or release on recognizance.
Such fee shall be deposited in the general fund of the State Treasury.

law.history: Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 158, sec. 5, effective July 1, 2008. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 235, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1984. -- Created 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 25.
